long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Insights and ideas through data literacy.

EventLibrary makes it easy to understand what data terms on a page mean and what data is available to use.

When you're on a website and you hover over a word that's in your library, it will annotate the page with context in the form of a tooltip.

If you want to explore what other data is available, you can open up the plugin and go searching through your library using search features available (search by tags, descriptions, event names, etc.)

Setup is super quick and documentation is no stress.  We'll only ask you to fill out things that are high value.

FREE TO USE
Our Starter plan comes with 4 free seats.

FOR TEAMS
If you need a larger plan you can contact us at admin@eventlibrary.io

INTEGRATIONS
EventLibrary integrates directly with Segment so you can easily upload your event taxonomy. We also supports CSV uploads if you want to export from a product like Amplitude or Mixpanel or upload an excel spreadsheet you've been tracking your taxonomy in.
